thread.title: Mon_Rose
thread.title_full: LD Mountain Centre reviewed by Mon_Rose

author: Mon_Rose
title: Mon_Rose
text: They had what I was looking for and delivered my product sooner than expected. I was also very happy with the quality of the item I ordered from LD Mountain Centre, as I ordered elsewhere beforehand, and had to return it. Would recommend this company! Thumbs up all round!!
